module.caption: RTC Calibration Demo application
module.info: RTC Calibration Demo application for XMEGA E.It shows how to calibrate the RTC clock source by using an external accurate clock source.In this project, the calibration value will be calculated and this value will be stored in configured EEPROM address. This calibration value from EEPROM can be used by user application code to load in RTC-CALIB register and automatic RTC correction can be enabled. More information can be found from application note 'Atmel AVR1638: XMEGA RTC Calibration', which is available in Atmel website.
